special_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast have lifelink.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white and red Cleric creature token with lifelink.
[0]: Until end of turn, Ameret becomes an 3/3 Angel creature with flying, indestructible, and haste.
[-2]: Until end of turn, target creature or planeswalker you control gains “Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on this permanent.”
